text: Appliance type, model, and finish (stainless, white, black) match approved schedule
Appliance dimensions and electrical/mechanical specs match rough-in layout
Delivery confirmed with no visible damage or missing parts
Manuals, warranty info, and installation hardware provided
Electrical outlet location, voltage, amperage, and receptacle type match appliance requirement
Water supply and drain stub-outs installed (for dishwashers, ice makers, laundry)
Gas connection & shutoff accessible and code-compliant (if applicable)
Venting provided for exhaust-type units (e.g., dryer, range hood, microwave combo)
Appliance leveled, secured, and connected to power/water/gas as applicable
Built-in units flush with adjacent cabinetry or counters
Seals and gaskets clean and properly aligned
Trim kits and accessory panels installed per manufacturer instruction
Appliance started/tested and performs basic function without error
No noise, vibration, leaks, or error codes during test cycle
Breakers labeled and appliance circuits confirmed

id: • NBC, CEC, CSA C22, CAN/ULC S600, ASTM F2324 (Appliance Testing)
• Manufacturer Specs: Whirlpool, GE, Frigidaire, Samsung, Bosch, LG, Maytag, Electrolux
